snippet: Andy Murray defeated Sam Querrey, as Britain advanced to the Davis Cup quarterfinals with its first victory over the United States since 1935.
abstract: Davis Cup Tennis Roundup; Andy Murray beats Sam Querrey to clinch Britain's 3-1 opening-round Davis Cup victory against the United States; other tournament results noted.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray defeated Sam Querrey, as Britain advanced to the Davis Cup quarterfinals with its first victory over the United States since 1935.

headline.print_headline: Murray Propels Britain to a Rare Win Over the U.S.
headline.main: Murray Propels Britain to a Rare Win Over the U.S.
